name: Oddy's Forest
description:
Oddy Haychase is a lonely wolf. He cannot leave his home in the foggy forest because, when he travels too far, the world loses all color, shape and meaning. How will he ever find a wolf pack to call his own? Players find mushrooms and other items to plant on their houses, to grow bigger houses - and to help Oddy advance towards his dream of getting wolves to come to him.

Keyboard Controls: ASDW / Arrows, Z, Space

Controller Controls: Left Stick, A, B

Created by Yori Kvitchko, Dustin Maertz, Michael Middleton for Global Game Jam 2019

Narrator: Michael Middleton

Theme music: 'Piano Fairy Tale' provided by Austin Timmerman/Pond5.com

Game sounds: Provided by Pond5.com
